title: S Voice (for tab 2 GT-P3100,P3110,P5100 or any other version of
description:
I got working S - Voice for our mighty Tab2. Works with any OS (4.0 stock, CM9, CM10, for all OS). Some times you will get Fc because this app is designed for Galaxy S3. But it works wel
 
Requirements :- 
1. A rooted Tab2.
 2. A file explorer like Root explorer & ES.
 3. S - Voice apk file
 
Procedure:-
 
1. Put S -Voice apk in sdcard & install it. (on starting it, it shows network error.)
 2. Install root explorer or es explorer.
 3. Open root explorer > go to data > apps > Move the file name com.vlingo.midas.apk file to system > apps & paste
 4. Now its time to edit build.prop file
 - find build.prop file in system folder > open it with TEXT EDITOR 
- U will lots of lines But, go to 15th line Original Line - ro.product.model=GT-P3100
 - U should edit that line as - ro.product.model=GT-I9300
 5. Now save & exit & reboot.
 *********IF ANY QUERY YOU CAN POST  A COMMENT**********

Note that only the com.vlingo.midas apk file is there in the torrent uploaded.The S Voice.apk will be uploaded in my next post.

IF YOU APPRECIATE MY WORK PLS KEEP THE TORRENT SEEDING ;)

ALSO FEEL FREE TO ASK ME TO UPLOAD ANY OTHER TORRENT YOU WANT BY LEAVING A COMMENT.

I WILL MAKE SURE THAT I WILL RESPOND TO ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITHOUT DELAY.
